edited_stories.edited_story_text: Yesterday I went hiking with Dad and Uncle Jack. They've been going to the same national park for years, and knew exactly where the best views were. We hiked up a mountain to see the most beautiful waterfall in the state. The landscape was breathtaking. All too soon, it was time to go home. We piled in Uncle Jack's pick-up and started the drive back to the city.
